name: ABBYSON_LIVING_Sara_Gold_Chevron_Swoop_Dining_Chair
reviews: Using as an oversized office chair and its perfect. Seems big for a dining table and not comfortable enough for living area. Perfect for what I use it for.
Looks good in my apartment and a nice, easy to move chair for the space. Not super comfortable but good for parties and to sit down for a minute
descrpition:
Add style and luxury to your living room, bedroom, craft room or anywhere else in your home. The gorgeous Sara swoop dining chair features a gold and cream chevron design that adds a trendy and stylish touch to any room. 

High-density foam cushioning Set includes: One (1) chairMaterials: Solid birch wood legs, linen upholsteryFinish: EspressoUpholstery color: Gold chevronSeat dimensions: 19 inches high x 23.25 inches wide x 26 inches deepDimensions: 37.5 inches high x 23.25 inches wide x 26 inches deepStyleContemporary, ModernMaterialFabric, Linen, WoodChair TypeAccent Chairs, Dining ChairsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightStandardColorBlack, GoldFurniture PatternChevron
